guideline.name: Annotation of DPWG Guideline for zuclopenthixol and CYP2D6

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily D member 6

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166302908

text.html: The guideline does not provide a recommendation for zuclopenthixol in normal metabolizers.

implications: The guideline does not provide a description of the impact of a normal metabolizer phenotype on zuclopenthixol.

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166302917

text.html:
There is insufficient information available to make a dosage recommendation.

  • If the effectiveness is insufficient: try a dose increase. Do not exceed 1.5 times the normal dose.

implications: The risk of ineffectiveness may be elevated. genetic variation leads to an increased conversion of zuclopentixol, which can result in a reduction of the plasma concentration.

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166302904
implications: The risk of side effects may be elevated. The genetic variation leads to decreased conversion of zuclopentixol, which causes the plasma concentration to be approximately 1.35-fold higher.
